attributes.action: bring up the issue of forming a second full time SAS regiment and disbanding the 2 TA part time SAS regiments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment the UK is the only country to have part time special forces. It must be better to have a second full time SAS Regiment to accompany the full time time 22 SAS regiment and disband 21 SAS Regiment and 23 SAS Regiment which are TA regiments.
